title: Yuusha Party Wo Tsuihou Sareta "skill Supporter," Nakama No Sukiru Wo Kaihou Shite Saikyou Ni Nariagaru
alternative_title: 勇者パーティを追放された【スキルサポーター】、仲間のスキルを解放して最強に成り上がる
status: 勇者パーティを追放された【スキルサポーター】、仲間のスキルを解放して最強に成り上がる
description:
Description :
        “Ars! You’re fired!” Ars’s job is a  who can unlock skills regardless of conditions. He has contributed as a member of the hero’s party, but the hero Leon banishes Ars because he has unlocked all of his own skills. Although Ars is depressed, he decides to continue his long-held dream of becoming an adventurer. Then, during a quest, he is reunited with his former student Alicia, and realizes that the  can be used not only by his companions but also by himself, and his ability blossoms… The story of a hero in another world who unlocks his own and his companions’ skills and becomes the strongest begins!
